metadata.name: Invisible Light
metadata.description:
Capturing infrared light around us!

In frame: A houseboat on shores of Dal Lake.

Photographer: Syed Kafeel Gillani

Location: Srinagar, India

Year: 2022

Licensing: NFT holders can display the photograph in private and/or public galleries, for advertising and/or promotion purposes, as long as the creator is credited. Provides NO rights for commercial purpose, that includes, commercial distribution, creating commercial merchandise and derivative works.
